head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths VANACORE, NANCY (NEE LEPORE)

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths VANACORE, NANCY (NEE LEPORE)

block.p: VANACORE-Nancy (nee Lepore). Of Palisades Park, NJ on October 6, 2000. Wife of Dominick Vanacore. Mother of Elizabeth Miguel, Stephen and the late Gennaro Vanacore. Also survived by three grandchildren and brothers and sisters. The family will receive their friends Sunday, 7-9 PM, and Monday, 2-4 and 7-9 PM, at Frank A. Patti and Kenneth Mikatarian Funeral Home, 327 Main St., Fort Lee, NJ. Funeral Mass Tuesday, 10 AM, St. Nicholas R.C. Church of Palisades Park, NJ. For further information call 201-944-0100.
